CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 1, 1954, pg. 17, reads: "Heagy - Spalding Inquest Scenes - Civic Unity Council - Member of the Civic Unity Council present at the hearing who on Friday will conduct a closed hearing on police brutality cases are, left to right, Frederic McKee, chairman; Dr. McKinley King, Atty. J. Alfred Wilner, P. L. Prattis, Miss Elaine Hall, secretary to the director, and J. F. Motz, executive secretary. - All Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Civic Unity Council, from left: Frederic McKee, Dr. McKinley King, Atty. J. Alfred Wilner, P. L. Prattis, Elaine Hall, and J. F. Motz, posed in interior at Heagy - Spalding inquest, another version
